problemDomain

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • problemDomain.Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    An item in the store. It is not directly sold. Instead it is passed as a SaleLineItem to be sold.

    • Constructor Summary

      The default constructor
